nodes.text: Meditation Garden Orenth was a meditation garden located within the Hidden Temple on Taivas. Attached to the side of one of the massive ships that made up the Temple's structure, the garden was suspended on a large platform extending out into the great open air of the canyon in which the Temple was erected. Amidst the exotic plant life was a large stone Orenth character, after which the garden was named.

The garden was the site of an ambush by Jariah Syn on Jedi Master Rasi Tuum in vengeance for his father's death. Tuum was able to subdue the violent pirate, and both parted with some sense of respect.
